metadata.name: gotoframe2_swf_5
metadata.description: Tests GOTO_FRAME2 opcode (0x9F) - stack-based frame navigation with comprehensive edge case coverage including numeric frames, string labels, negative frame handling, and target path parsing
missing_features: Actual frame navigation (requires MovieClip timeline management - graphics-only)
Frame label registry/lookup (requires SWF FrameLabel tag parsing - graphics-only)
MovieClip context switching for target paths (requires full MovieClip tree - graphics-only)

implementation_notes.target_path_parsing: Implemented - parses 'path:frame' syntax and separates target from frame identifier
implementation_notes.scene_bias: Implemented in code but not comprehensively tested - rare feature for multi-scene Flash movies
implementation_notes.no_graphics_mode: Logs frame navigation instead of actually changing frames - appropriate for NO_GRAPHICS mode
